title: Jollybaby
author: Jollybaby
content: Hi guys am new here I want to know about bitcoin I whould you to give me some resource thank you..

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk but first we already have a dedicated thread for newbies orientation ground, so I will prefer you post over there. About things to learn there are many thread that have explained more things concerning the rules and regulation here. For introduction please post in the topic Naija Novice Hangout {Newbies introduction & Orientation} Thread., then for guide I will advice you to constantly make use of the Beginners & Help  sections.

comments.author: Amphenomenon
comments.body: Quote from: Jollybaby on December 04, 2023, 09:15:54 AMHi guys am new here I want to know about bitcoin I whould you to give me some resource thank you.. Your are welcome to btt forum and our very own local board, is good you want to learn about bitcoin, here are some resourcesmastering bitcoinGetting started with BitcoinLearn me a BitcoinUseful information for Nigerian newbies These resources are among the best to learn about bitcoin as beginners but if there is a part you don not understand, you can ask question here in our local board or in the beginners & help board

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Jollybaby you are welcome to bitcointalk forum and to our local board, e dey sweet me as I dey see more newbies wey dey enter the forum come locate our local board, because na them be one of the set of forum members wey go make our local board dey very active. But the part wey no too sweet na the first stage of spamming wey many newbies dey partake in. Anyway sha me I go just tell you say make you no copy other person work come do like say na your own oo, because this kind of thing naim dey tear people account sharp sharp. And I go still like advice make you take better time study the forum rules well well, because if you go default for any one you fit receive ban ASAP. This na link to the forum rules: Unofficial General Guidelines For Posting

comments.author: odunybiz
comments.body: Quote from: Jollybaby on December 04, 2023, 09:15:54 AMHi guys am new here I want to know about bitcoin I whould you to give me some resource thank you.. You are highly welcome to the forum. You are at the right place. Has @Amphenomenon as given you alot of link that could guide you towards learning about BTC, I will as well want you to get yourself familiar with the forum as you go through this link as guide1. Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.02. [Guide] Searching effectivelyhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5276341

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Jollybaby on December 04, 2023, 09:15:54 AMHi guys am new here I want to know about bitcoin I whould you to give me some resource thank you.. Welcome to the forum, since there's enough links that talked about bitcoin already provided to you by some members, i will advise that you go through them gradually and read to understand by taking your time, also it's something important to inform you about the forum's rules and regulations which you're expected to know and go about them, part of which is don't plagiarize, this will determine your stay here or not.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: Jollybaby on December 04, 2023, 09:15:54 AMHi guys am new here I want to know about bitcoin I whould you to give me some resource thank you.. You are really welcome to the forum. Here is a solution center for Crypto currency and bitcoin related matters. All you need yo know is right here. What you just need to do is to calm down and understand how the forum works. and how to scale through without falling to a victim of plagiarism and others. Here might be interesting to you if you haven't fail the law. But when you'll do, and you are been treated equally according to your crime here will no longer be safe for you anymore. Sure be careful and always ask questions in other to know your left from your right.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: Jollybaby on December 04, 2023, 09:15:54 AMHi guys am new here I want to know about bitcoin I whould you to give me some resource thank you.. Jollybaby welcome to the forum. E get one person for the forum wey him name na JollyG... I nor wan complete am make him nor come knack me tag because that one na him talent.This is a community where all man dey together but on their own. The way you go grow for the forum depends on how serious wey you dey. Follow the rules to the later. As a beginner, nor try shook mouth for wetin nor concern you. Just dey your lane until you learn the ropes of the forum wella.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Jollybaby we welcome you carjarly, onto say nah your first time we understand say you no know say no be here you supposed for male this introduction post as we don already keep thread for anything wey concern introduction. And just as the first comment don show you the link just click am go there reintroduce yourself there  again and make yourself feel comfortable for the house. Try the fo through the forum read and grap things both for the local and general boards make you no com the make mistakes similar to this one, na so we all take learn sabi today. If e go possible I go like make moderator do him work on this post sharperly.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: You are welcome to bitcointalk forum, this is a Bitcoin forum where you can talk much about bitcoin and learn about bitcoin.  It is a place people learn for free, you just need to feel free to ask questions which you think is challenging to you. You will really enjoy Bitcointalk forum as a learning centre for bitcoin if only you are really willing to learn. Your desire, your seriousness to learn about bitcoin will determine how fast you will be able to acquire knowledge about Bitcoin,  if you really want learn being consistent and focused in the forum will give you everything you want.

comments.author: Abdulzuruku01
comments.body: Quote from: Jollybaby on December 04, 2023, 09:15:54 AMHi guys am new here I want to know about bitcoin I whould you to give me some resource thank you.. Welcome to bitcointalk forum and the Naija board , where you can learn about bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Feel free to interact with us as we are all members of the same family.Some members have already sent you the materials you requested via links, and more links are still on the way because they will all be helpful to you. So read, make research and ask questions, and in order to remain in this forum you must avoid plagiarism (copying)I suggest that you visit other boards, particularly beginners and help, bitcoin discussions . I can assure you that you won't regret joining this forum.

comments.author: Agbamoni
comments.body: Welcome jollybaby. Although am curious to know if you're a female or male. As your name sound more of a female name. Nevertheless, the forum is the best place for discussion and contribution. There are more to the forum of which with time you will see yourself getting more familiar to it and you will understand your place in the forum. Definitely there will be some difficulties while trying to communicate and most of them are counters, advice and argument. All of these are to help strengthen your knowledge here in the forum. Some newbies feel bad whenever they criticize or throw words at them. But one thing i will tell you is to make yourself strong and face those challenges. Goodluck to you on your new Bitcointalk journey.

comments.author: Jollybaby
comments.body: I want to thank you all for the links and advice, I must confess that, I didn't expect the turn up to be this great.Ones again thanks guys

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Quote from: Jollybaby on December 08, 2023, 11:15:01 AMI want to thank you all for the links and advice, I must confess that, I didn't expect the turn up to be this great.Ones again thanks guysMembers of this Forum are always ready to  support members who need help to get knowledge about Bitcoin,  if you really want to learn bitcoin no doubt that you will get as much knowledge that you want . Just  be ready to learn and you won't regret your bitcoin journey as you join the forum. This is a place where people learn bitcoin for free , so you don't need to surprise when you see members who contribute to give out understanding this is the essence of the forum.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: Amphenomenon on December 04, 2023, 11:43:08 AMQuote from: Jollybaby on December 04, 2023, 09:15:54 AMHi guys am new here I want to know about bitcoin I whould you to give me some resource thank you.. Your are welcome to btt forum and our very own local board, is good you want to learn about bitcoin, here are some resourcesmastering bitcoinGetting started with BitcoinLearn me a BitcoinUseful information for Nigerian newbies These resources are among the best to learn about bitcoin as beginners but if there is a part you don not understand, you can ask question here in our local board or in the beginners & help boardMake I join odas welcome our newest newbie, enter btt and especially for dis our local board. No need to disorganise the new member with more links, na make im start out with dis ones for here, dem go help very well as a beginner. Anoda important thing na to try to de active for di forum, because as you de read oda people comments na so you go de add to your knowledge about bitcoin, and crypto related matters. Somebody like me wey enter forum without any knowledge of crypto, na dis scop I take build my self, I go hear comments and I go go research am, come back, ask questions and make my own comment, just like dat my knowledge begin to de increase. All di best to OP, just find di method wey you fit adopt to increase your crypto knowledge and grow.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Quote from: Jollybaby on December 08, 2023, 11:15:01 AMI want to thank you all for the links and advice, I must confess that, I didn't expect the turn up to be this great.Ones again thanks guysOp, e nor suppose dey surprising to you say helping hand come at your request, because na so we dey do for here, and the sweetest part na be say you nor dey pay money to learn anything for here all knowledge na free. So if you get any more questions or suggestions make you no hesitate to ask, because our ogah Dem wey dey sef, dey very ready to help any newbies. I go like advise you say make you no fail to read oo because naim the thing wey dey determine your success for this forum.
